movies.title: Thor
movies.stars: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Mark Ruffalo
movies.plot: Thor is exiled by his father, Odin, the King of Asgard, to the Earth to live among mortals. When he lands on Earth, his trusted weapon Mjolnir is discovered and captured by S.H.I.E.L.D.

movies.title: Wonder woman
movies.stars: Gal Gadot, Chris Pine, Robin Wright, Lucy Davis
movies.plot: Princess Diana of an all-female Amazonian race rescues US pilot Steve. Upon learning of a war, she ventures into the world of men to stop Ares, the god of war, from destroying mankind.

movies.title: Logan
movies.stars: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen, Boyd Holbrook
movies.plot: Logan comes out of retirement to escort a young mutant named Laura to a safe place. He meets with other mutants, who run from an evil corporation that has been experimenting with them

movies.title: Despicable me 3
movies.stars: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen, Boyd Holbrook
movies.plot: Gru meets his long-lost twin brother Dru, after getting fired from the Anti-Villain League. However, the siblings find themselves at loggerheads with a child actor-turned-villain.

movies.title: Star war
movies.stars: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen, Boyd Holbrook
movies.plot: Princess Leia gets abducted by the insidious Darth Vader. Luke Skywalker then teams up with a Jedi Knight, a pilot and two droids to free her and to save the galaxy from the violent Galactic Empire.

movies.title: Pitch Perfect 3
movies.stars: Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, Brittany Snow, Anna Camp
movies.plot: The Bellas have split after winning the World Championship. But they reunite for one last overseas singing competition to make music and some questionable decisions.

movies.title: Op√©ration casse-noisette 2
movies.stars: Will Arnett, Maya Rudolph, Bobby Cannavale, Bobby Moynihan
movies.plot: Following the events of the first film, Surly and his friends must stop Oakton City's mayor from destroying their home to make way for a dysfunctional amusement park.
